An expansion of your city center district [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every citizen in this city. [NEWLINE]-1 of the primary yield for all basic tile improvments in this city (-1 [ICON_Food] farms, -1 [ICON_Production] mines, -1 [ICON_Food] fishing boats, etc.).[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_Production] Production towards military units in this city. [NEWLINE]-10 City Defense.
Adjacency: Major yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides minor yield bonus for adjacent districts

An expansion of your city center district [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production for every citizen in this city. [NEWLINE]-1 of the primary yield for all basic tile improvments in this city (-1 [ICON_Food] farms, -1 [ICON_Production] mines, -1 [ICON_Food] fishing boats, etc.).[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_Production] Production towards military units in this city. [NEWLINE]-10 City Defense.
Adjacency: Major yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides minor yield bonus for adjacent districts

An expansion of your city center district [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production for every citizen in this city. [NEWLINE]-1 of the primary yield for all basic tile improvments in this city (-1 [ICON_Food] farms, -1 [ICON_Production] mines, -1 [ICON_Food] fishing boats, etc.).[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_Production] Production towards military units in this city. [NEWLINE]-10 City Defense.
Adjacency: Major yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides minor yield bonus for adjacent districts

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Library building in the Campus district whenever it is constructed. The Librariy building provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production equal to its intrinsic [ICON_Science] Science output. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Amphitheatre building in the Theater Square district whenever it is constructed. The Amphitheatre building gains +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing slots. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Market building in the Commercial Hub district whenever it is constructed. +100% [ICON_Gold] Gold from the Market building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows an additional district to be built above the usual population limit. +25% [ICON_Production] Production towards engineering projects (Aquaduct, Dam, Canal, and Neighborhoods).

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a free Arena building in the Entertainment Complex district whenever it is constructed. +100% [ICON_Production] Production towards the Entertainment Complex district.
Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants +25% [ICON_Gold] Gold from buildings in the Commercial district. +15% [ICON_Production] production towards Commercial Hub Projects.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the Campus district Academic Conference Project. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Academic Conference Project Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Project can be completed 3 times. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a Campus district with at least +4 [ICON_Science] Science adjacency in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the Theater Square district Publish Great Works Project. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Publish Great Works Project Grants +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Project can be completed 3 times. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a Theater Square district and that the Printing Press Technolgy has been researched. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the Commercial Hub district Foreign Trade Expedition Project. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Foreign Trade Expedition Project Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Project can be completed 3 times. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a Commercial Hub district and that a Shipyard has been built in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants +1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal and +1 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron per turn and a free Military Enigneer. Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Unlocks Steam Power technology if not already researched

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Industrial Zone district gains [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to its [ICON_Production] Production adjacency and recieves a free Workshop and Factory building whenever it is constructed. Grants 1 copy of the unique Luxury Resource Textiles which provides +4 Happiness.
Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Citizen] Population and +50% Growth upon completion.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Plots within 2 tiles of a Campus district with a Library gain +1 Appeal and an additional +1 Appeal with a University. Neighborhood districts gain [ICON_Science] Science based on the Appeal of the tile. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 3 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 5 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE]+6 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 7 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May build the City Park and Seaside Resort Tile Improvement if not already available. The City Park and Seaside Resort Tile Improvements gain +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to a Wonder. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants +4 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities. +15 [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold if the city is Ecstatic. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+30% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May build all [ICON_Power] Power supplying land Tile Improvemnts. All [ICON_Power] Power producing Buildings and Tile Improvements gain +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Buildings that provide additional yields when powered receive +2 of their respective yields. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_Power] Power from Misc Sources.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows the Civil Engineer Unit to be recruited and immediatly recruites 1 Civil Engineer Unit. Prevents structural damage from Natural Disasters. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Civil Engineer Units can expend charges to speed [ICON_Production] Production of Non-Engineering (Aqueduct, Dam, Canal, Flood Barrier) Districts and Buildings.
Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Neighborhood districts recieves +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each adjacent district. +75% [ICON_Production] Production towards Neighborhood districts.
Civil Engineer

Modern era support unit. Can spend a charge to add +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards Non-Engineering Type Districts and +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards Modern Era and later Buildings. [ICON_Production] Production bonus increases for earlier era buildings. 2 build charges.
Publish Great Works
Fund Foreign Trade Expedition
Host Academic Conference
Support Space Race
Support Immigration

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)
Support Space Race
Provides -2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities while active. Grants -4 Loyalty and +1 [ICON_Citizen] Population upon completion.

+1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith from the adjacent Classical Era Expansion

+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Classical Era Expansion
+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from the adjacent Classical Era Expansion
All districts receive an additional standard adjacency bonus for being adjacent to another district. +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards the Modern Era Core Expansion.

Allows Farms to be built on Tundra terrain. After Civil Engineering is unlocked Farms can be built on Tundra Hills. In Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, and Tundra Hills all Mines provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and strategic resource accumulation rate is +100%. Reduces the purchase cost of tiles in these terrain types by 50%. Tundra and Tundra Hill tiles adjacent to a Rural Community gain +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, as well as +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production with Forests.
